node.title: Datacenter Myths
node.excerpt: Hyperscale realities are very different to what most people think. Myth 1 - Bigger data centers are more efficient..

node.title: A better solution for our planet

node.title: Internet is growing wild
node.excerpt: A big majority of users in the world connect to servers that are not present in their region and as such experience higher costs and low performance..
